name: Thou Shalt Fall
description:
Thou Shalt Fall is an 2 player action game where you will put your knighthood to the test!

Controls:

Player 1:

Shield - 1, 2, 3

Lance - Q, W, E

Player 2:

Shield - 8, 9, 0

Lance - I, O, P

Developed for the High Level ECDD GameJam by Gabriel Teixeira e Caroline Santos
